```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
View(diamonds)
```

Exploring the data

```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)

```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
ggpairs(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, y = carat)) +
  geom_
```

```{r}

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes( x = carat))
```
